snippet: To help explain ABN Amro’s core values this week, Gerrit Zalm dressed up as his “sister,” Priscilla, wearing a bright blue dress and a vivid red wig. Oh, and his fake sibling just happens to be a brothel owner.
abstract: To help explain ABN Amro’s core values this week, Gerrit Zalm dressed up as his “sister,” Priscilla, wearing a bright blue dress and a vivid red wig. Oh, and his fake sibling just happens to be a brothel owner.

byline.original: By RACHEL ABRAMS and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: How Banks Work, as Told by ABN Amro's Chairman in Drag
